column4: Hi, I'm trying to have a share files between two ubuntu computers, I set up samba, the shared folder, and everything yet it does not pop up on the host computer.
NFS, also, does not show anything hwilde.
did you follow the guide from the bot
what should i do after that
read it man it tells you
i don't want to setup at startup, i want to set up now.
read it it tells you for real
is it not on your desktop
i looked more closely at nfs, just what i was looking for ;)
